Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ScrollActor
          Cell

public class Cell
extends ScrollActor

A cell is the circle of mass that the player controls around the world.

Author:
Wayde Gilliam, Brian Turner, Cecilia Martin, Ethan Hendricks

Constructor Summary
Cell()
          Creates a new Cell with a random color
Cell(java.awt.Color color, int rotation, int size, int mass)
          Creates a new Cell that is a divided portion of a master Cell and shoots off of the master and is controlled the same way
 
Method Summary
 void act()
           
 void addMass(int num)
          Increases the mass and size of the cell
 void counter()
          Updates the counter with the current mass
 void death()
          "Kills" the cell, ends the game, and shows the endGame screen
 void divide()
          Divides the cell into two Cells of half mass and size
 void ejectMass()
          Ejects a MassBlob from the Cell at it's current rotation, and remove mass
 int getMass()
          Returns the mass of the Cell
 void hitMassBlob(MassBlob massBlob)
          Removes any MassBlob that the Cell is touching, and add mass to the Cell
 void hitProtein()
          Removes any Protein that the Cell is touching, add mass to the Cell, and spawn a new protein in a random location in the World
 void hitVirus()
          Removes any Virus that the Cell is touching, and remove mass
 void removeMass(int num)
          Deceases the mass and size of the cell
 void setDirection(greenfoot.MouseInfo m)
          Sets the direction of the World based on the mouses position, and moves in that direction a certain speed
 void setImage()
          Sets the image of the cell based on size and mass when called
 void setSpeed(greenfoot.MouseInfo m)
          Sets the speed of the cell based on the distance between the mouse and the cell

Constructor Detail

Cell

public Cell()
Creates a new Cell with a random color

Cell

public Cell(java.awt.Color color,
            int rotation,
            int size,
            int mass)
Creates a new Cell that is a divided portion of a master Cell and shoots off of the master and is controlled the same way

Parameters:
color - The color of the master
rotation - The current rotation of the master
size - The current size of the master
mass - The current mass of the master

Increases the mass and size of the cell

Parameters:
num - The amount the mass and size will be increased by

"Kills" the cell, ends the game, and shows the endGame screen

Divides the cell into two Cells of half mass and size

Ejects a MassBlob from the Cell at it's current rotation, and remove mass

Returns the mass of the Cell

hitMassBlob

public void hitMassBlob(MassBlob massBlob)
Removes any MassBlob that the Cell is touching, and add mass to the Cell

Parameters:
massBlob - The MassBlob that the Cell is touching, used to access the MassBlob to tell whether it's stopped it's initial movement

hitProtein

public void hitProtein()
Removes any Protein that the Cell is touching, add mass to the Cell, and spawn a new protein in a random location in the World

hitVirus

public void hitVirus()
Removes any Virus that the Cell is touching, and remove mass

Deceases the mass and size of the cell

num - The amount the mass and size will be decreased by

setDirection

public void setDirection(greenfoot.MouseInfo m)
Sets the direction of the World based on the mouses position, and moves in that direction a certain speed

Parameters:
m - The current MouseInfo (position)

Sets the image of the cell based on size and mass when called

Sets the speed of the cell based on the distance between the mouse and the cell

Parameters:
